replies.body:
@Crazy_ I used to play the server as 'DruMC', I started back when it was MCZone

@PokerFace Favorite gamemode is TDM

@ItsAthena I don't know the staff too well. My favorite moments have been back when the server was a lot more active, as in 100ish players a day. My real name is Andrew, but I go by Dru.
